additionalInformation: Null Talisman automatically upgrade on the 25th minute mark.

The item's attributes grants the following bonuses: 40/80 health and 0.2/0.4 health regeneration. 60/120 mana and 1/2 mana regeneration. 2/4 attack speed bonus and 0.33/0.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes and 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
2/4 attack speed bonus and 0.33/0.67 main armor.
5/10 main attack damage to heroes and 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
name: Null Talisman
description: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
trivia: Null Talisman was one of the best stat efficient items in the game, purchased by most heroes, before the introduction of Bracer and Wraith Band in version 6.00.
tips: For intelligence heroes, a Bracer grants just as much attack damage as a Null Talisman.
